short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shrink and Copy your long URL with a click of a button. Remember it works on a current tab you are on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shink your long URL right from the browser. You no longer have to copy the link go to a site to shorten it. You can do it right from the tab. Click on the icon to shorten and copy to clipboard. Simple and Useful.
